\% %%%%%%%%%%%%%% % % IPA % %%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\section{Sounds}

\begin{frame}
\frametitle{IPA}

\begin{itemize}
\item Package needed: TIPA
\item Two ways to summon IPA in \LaTeX
  \begin{enumerate}
  \item using \textbackslash begin\{IPA\} ... \textbackslash end\{IPA\}
  \item or \textbackslash textipa\{...\}
  \end{enumerate}
\item Example: [\textprimstress\textipa{hE.\textltilde\t{oU}}] `hello' = [\textbackslash textprimstress\textbackslash textipa\textbackslash\{hE\textbackslash textltilde\textbackslash t\textbackslash \{oU\textbackslash\}\textbackslash\} ]
\item Download ``TIPA manual'' at http://www.l.u-tokyo.ac.jp/\textasciitilde fkr/tipa/tipaman.pdf
\end{itemize}

\end{frame}
